explanation: [0-0] At a birthday party decorated with black, white, and blue objects, the lights are blue, and many white rectangular boxes are placed on the ground. The rectangular box in the center is black, with a two-tier black polka dot cake on top. A little boy stands in front of the cake, facing right towards his dad. To the right of the dad are two other little boys, one of whom is standing on a black stool. All three boys are wearing blue and white striped jerseys. The mom, wearing a blue top and white pants, stands on the left, clasping her hands together and looking at the little boy in front of the cake. The dad reaches for the cake. Various decorations are placed on the other rectangular boxes, and behind them is a blue and white striped backdrop with English letters printed on it. A photographer on the left is filming the family with a video camera. A person wearing white clothes is in the lower left corner.

[0-7] Then, the mom and the person in the lower-left corner clap their hands. The little boy in front of the cake stretches out his left hand to hug his dad, who leans closer to the boy and kisses him. The camera then zooms in as the mom holds the boy in front of the cake, and the boy leans forward to blow out the candles on the cake.
